website_summaries.verdict: Slender slits keep your most slenderly-sliced vegetables safe from falling in the flame.
pros: Slender slits keep food more secure
Leaves enough room to grill other food as well
cons: Slope of the pan makes it difficult to get tools inside to flip food

customer_reviews.title: Great size basket for smaller grills
customer_reviews.text: Great size basket for smaller grills. We had a only junky one from bed bath and beyond that was so thin if deformed on the first use. This is made of much thicker stainless steel and has a good height to keep all your food contained. Pretty easy to clean afterwards. In the photos, the basket is on a Weber Spirit 210 grill for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Picky about grill accessories, this works!
customer_reviews.text: We grill 3 to 5 times per week. This little pan is great for veggies and fish that wants to fall apart. Very durable, won’t warp with high temperatures. Relatively easy to clean although food sticks in the little holes but no biggie. We are picky about our grill accessories and this one works
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Good size for portable grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket is a good size especially for a portable grill . It can hold enough veggies or other small food items for about 3 or 4 people. It fits into my dishwasher and cleans up nicely. It seems very well made and should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT J.

customer_reviews.title: Well done Weber.
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Traeger PTG wood pellet grill well. It lets me grill/smoke a whole meal for 2 at once. I got a 2nd one as well in case I want to make a large batch of veggies without taking all afternoon. I looked at similar designs but this one was the right shape, depth, and width to fit my grill and my appetite. The circular ones are probably fine, but in my case I didn't want to waste the corner space.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to clean and I still couldn’t get it clean. Look for the lodge cast iron version.
customer_reviews.text: It did what it was supposed to do but it took a very long time to clean with hard scrubbing and I still couldn’t get all of the baked on grease off of it. Do yourself a favor and buy the Lodge cast-iron version of this. It’s much easier to clean. Lodge chef collection 11 inch cast iron chef style grill topper. I purchased both and like the cast iron better.
customer_reviews.author: RJM824

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions carefully
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read the dimensions, it's a little smaller than I expected. Haven't had a chance to use it yet, but it's nice and sturdily-made as with all things Weber. With just two of us it will be more than big enough to do our veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Carl L. Young III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, good looking stainless basket. I have used it several times on the grill for ham pieces as well as assorted vegetables. Cooks everything to perfection and is very easy to clean up. I have not put it in the dishwasher; have washed it by hand and have not had to scrub it to get it clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mschloe

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find small size
customer_reviews.text: Thi's is just what we were looking for to use on a smaller gas grill. Works great for 2 people and doesn't use up all the grill area.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado gal

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket and use almost every time we grill out. Love slicing up fresh mushrooms, zucchini, yellow crookneck squash, onions and potatoes in a little olive oil and veggie seasoning. I mix everything in a gallon zip lock to coat the veggies well. Everything has such a wonderful grilled flavor! Be sure to pre-heat the basket on the grill before adding the veggies for best results. This small basket is perfect for two people. If you are grilling for a bigger family you should consider getting the large basket, instead.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other veggie baskets for my grill.... but this is by far the best. Easy to clean and holds plenty of veggie for the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: cpj

customer_reviews.title: Performed great on the grill! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely study & easy to grill with. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective, convenient size.
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect in size and material. Simple and effective. I use for grilling onions either on an upper warming grate or on lower grate over fire. With strong sturdy tongs I can lift it up while filled and move closer or further from fire which gives complete heat control. One of the items I depend on and use all the time for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: miacid

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilled veggies
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grilling basket! It fits on my 18 inch Weber kettle grill with room to spare for a couple of brats. Keep in mind that it is small and hard to stir the veggies around without spilling a few on the coals so you only want to fill it half way if you'll be messing with it. The key is to mix the contents with your oil or seasoning in a bowl before adding to the basket. The handles make it easy to grip. I've put this in the dishwasher (lower level) and it comes out clean and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: I use this with my Char-Broil Big Easy Smoker. Works great for veggies
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Char-Broil Big Easy Smoker. Works great for veggies! I cut up some zucchini squash, onions, potatoes, whatever I want, and they turn out great. I also smoked some sliced apples in this and they are awesome (with butter, sugar and cinnamon). Just be sure to spray with a little bit of the cooking spray so it doesn't stick. Great easy way to grill/smoke veggies without making a mess in your grill.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chopped veggies
customer_reviews.text: Works great for chopped veggies. If you want to grill something larger it will be difficult, but we chop peppers, mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, etc and it works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stack

customer_reviews.title: Great little grilling basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grilling basket for smaller amounts of food. Fairly easy to grasp with a tongs and potholder. Highsided so food doesn't spill over. Easy cleanup in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill pan
customer_reviews.text: Product is great use it on the bbq grill for veggies I have used it in the oven as well with no issues grate set up is good nothing slides through them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foleno

customer_reviews.title: Size is Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The size specifications are a little misleading. We thought it would fit our mini Acorn but it doesn't. The sides angle out so far that the lid won't shut. We gave away to family.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I also own the larger version of this grill basketbut wanted one that would allow more of the grill to be used for other foods. This basket is perfect for two! It cooks evenly, the high sides make stir-grilling veggies such as green beans, eggplant, potatoes wedges and more fast and easy, and it cleans quickly. Plus, it's stainless steel, so--unlike other grill baskets I've owned--I won't have to throw it away due to rust. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling vegetables much easier
customer_reviews.text: Great basket for grilling vegetables for two. I've done beans, zucchini, peppers and onions, and even potatoes. Have had no issues with anything sticking to the basket, and gets a great grill flavor while being much easier than putting small slices of things directly on the grill. Doesn't take up too much real estate on the grilling surface, either, so it's easy to do vegetables in the basket, burgers on the grill, and still have space to toast buns.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love grilled vegys and they come out great with this tool. Hard to clean in my opinion but maybe I am doing something wrong. Nahh
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grilling accessory
customer_reviews.text: We have a small Weber grill and this fits it fine. It is well made and easy to clean. Cooking vegetables is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product...quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for grilling up veggies. They are a little bit of a pain to clean, but if you get the stainless steel scout pads. They clean right off, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: morganmj

customer_reviews.title: A must have for BBQ addicts
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this basket. I found out about it only recently and this makes a huge difference when cooking small items or veggies that might fall into the BBQ. The material and construction is great. A tip to those who might want to make it look good as new after washing it normally, soak it in white vinegar for an hour and it will get rid of the yellow stain. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Turbodelta

customer_reviews.title: Nice veggie pan
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but this is a sturdy pan, it’s a nice size for my particular grill, Looks like it should work well
customer_reviews.author: WisconsinHome

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have 2 One for veggies, potatoes and stuff. The other one I put charcoal and wood To smoke in the grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Description
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 3 stars because it is smaller than the description. It measures 7.5 inches x 7.5 inches and is 2.25 deep. Was expecting it to be bigger per the measurements on the description. It cooks enough for 1-2 people. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: JEP

customer_reviews.title: Great little basket
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my webber grill all the time. Dishwasher safe. Great for grilling veggies. Etc.
customer_reviews.author: judeann

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I lived without this
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It works great and is easy to toss in the dishwasher. I purposely bought this size, since I normally only cook for 2, but I'm going to purchase another larger size for company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All that & bag of chips
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on our table top Weber Grill. Very solid sturdy holds it's shape. Coat it with oil add diced veggies grill still have room for one very large steak or 3 large burgers. Have used almost daily this Summer will be in our RV ring when we go full-time.
customer_reviews.author: pelenaka lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great on the grill
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Grilled some veggies and this did the trick. Only problem is that it is a bit difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller grills
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this veggie tray! It’s great for our small, two-burner Weber grill. Holds enough veggies for about 2-3 people. If you have more to cook, I’d suggest getting the larger version. But for a two person household, works great! Easy clean up in the dishwasher is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: avocaadotoast

customer_reviews.title: Loving it, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket is so much better than our previous one that looked like thick meshed wire. Our old one would burn easily and the veggies would shrink and fall out of the holes. This grill basket is smaller than I expected. I should have measures it before purchasing because it doesn't fit enough veggies for our whole family. But it is much higher quality than our older "burned up" veggie basket, so I can't complain!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice smaller basket
customer_reviews.text: I like that this basket is smaller, so it will fit on a small grill and still have room for meat. Also, the holes aren't so small that I worry about veggies falling into the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S. Paschold

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the grill when you want to cook veggies and cuts of smaller meat.
customer_reviews.author: WellBid

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: A great addition for anyone that loves to grill! Makes grilling vegetables so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: CavalierAttitude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy grill basket that holds enough for a family but doesn't take up too much grill space. Easy clean up, too! Perfect for a veggie side dish to serve with the main meat course.
customer_reviews.author: M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Makes me eat veggies more often
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought this. It's convenient for when Salads get old after a while and the taste of grilled veggies with salt and seasoning can't be beat. Just season a bag of frozen vegetables with a little olive or avocado oil and you have a really healthy side dish
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for two
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for use on my 22" Weber charcoal grill. I have a couple of larger baskets but find that I use this one most often. It leaves enough room to grill other items at the same time. It is a heavy gauge of metal, and has nice high walls. Another great Weber product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel, great size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small table top grill, or for a larger one. Holds ample amount of vegies for 2-3 people. Stainless steel, with no toxic coating! This is the one I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Camper at Heart

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wish had been a little larger but pleased with purchase. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This smaller vegetable steel basket is great for two people
customer_reviews.text: This smaller vegetable steel basket is great for two people. The sides are high enough to be able to stir items in the basket without losing them on the grill. Cleans nicely and handles easily. Can be set side by side with other items on the grill. I used it to cook corn on the cobb too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 18 inch kettle grill
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for an 18 in kettle grill. I need to buy actual steel wool for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grill
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I expected, because I think the dimensiions were the outside dimensions of the basket, including handles. The actual grilling surface is about the size of a small fry pan. It is very sturdy and well made. I apply a little cooking spray to it, and have had no problems with sticking. The metal discolored a little from the cooking, (what grilling utensil doesn't?) but this does not affect its performance. Since it is a little smaller than I wanted, my next move is to buy the bigger one!
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Works well. Discolored under high heat. A little small
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job of roasting anything without falling thru the grate. Veggies, sharp, scallops, etc. Just wish I had the bigger size. This doesn't hold much. Discolored under heat first cook. Not entirely unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: HutchyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Great for grilling vegetables or other small foods.
customer_reviews.author: E. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product, but small
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I expected. I think when I looked at the dimensions online I expected the base to be that size. The surface area for cooking is sufficient for 2 bell peppers, max. The material is terrific. It holds up great, nothing has stuck to it (I use spray oil), and cleans easily. I ended up buying a larger basket too for when I cook more veggies or 1 lb of shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for Effort
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for cooking a single serving of vegetables, which is difficult to cook a mix of vegetables as you will run out of space quickly and have already cut vegetables left over with nowhere to go. I'd recommend the bigger size or just cook everything right on the grill in larger pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Skew

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: Remarkably inexpensive grill pan that works really well. I have a larger mesh pan but it'[s too big for two people. The punch marks allow heat and some flame to reach whatever you are roasting. They are a bit "jagged" on the bottom and the outside of the sides. I took some 400 wet/dry paper to them to take the rough edges off, otherwise its a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: RolidnotTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Small grill basket
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It allows me to grill veges conveniently while other items are also on the grill. The basket also makes serving up the veges a breeze. The basket is the right size for my small electric grill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Traeger
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this basket to cook things like apples, peaches, peppers, shrimp etc on the Traeger. Things that you would normally worry would fall through the cooking grate, or might "mush" and be difficult to handle with tongs or a spatula. It works great for that, and this is a nice size. On my Lil 'Tex Traeger it fits nicely inside, with enough room to spare to also cook a whole chicken or similar. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MovieGuyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packages, and they are not good at all. Hard to remove, & do not stick.
customer_reviews.author: MGL

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoky veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact; rinsed and we were ready to go. We filled it with chopped veggies and my husband grilled them up. Very handy as we didn't have enough room on the skewers for all the veggies anyway, we didn't have to waste the leftover pieces. It even looks good on the table for serving, with a pad to protect the table from the heat, of course. Next my husband says he's gonna try doing fish in it.
customer_reviews.author: zee1

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small Weber Spirit grill
customer_reviews.text: Great for my small Weber Spirit grill. I had a larger basket that crowded the grill and made it hard for me to have enough room to turn items - this small basket helps that situation a lot. Can hold a average bundle of asparagus (stems trimmed) when placed diagonally in the basket. Also adequate to hold a standard size package of Brussels sprouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L.

customer_reviews.title: perfect smaller size to grill vegetables on the smallerQ1200 weber grill
customer_reviews.text: perfect smaller size to grill vegetables on the smallerQ1200 weber grill
customer_reviews.author: marym

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for any small/medium grill. Holds a good amount and is easy to toss with the handles
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy basket for the grill!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tray for the grill. It works well for grilling my veggies! So far I have used it for squash, sweet potatoes, and okra. It cleans up fairly easily, although its not still as shiny as it used to be. It is a very sturdy and heavy basket and I have no worries about how well it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time to heat frozen french fries on my gas grill on the end of the grill I wasn't using for burgers. It worked great. I'm looking forward to using it to cook veggies for my vegetarian wife while I cook real food for myself on the other end of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Engineering Geek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for one or two people
customer_reviews.text: Love this little grill basket. Fits a tomato some veggies and room to spare for one person (or two). Cleans up nicely (I do sprit with olive oil or spray first). What amazed me the most was the quality for the price. Strong basket, not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pennypinchingmama

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: If you need to cook chopped veggies, this works great! Nice quality metal and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Great for grillers
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dad. Was a great gift! He’s hard to shop for but I know he likes to try to eat healthy, figured this would help him out!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina nelson

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small vegetable basket. It fits perfectly on smaller grills (and of course larger ones). We use it all the time to grill sides. It will stain, no getting away from that, but if you grill a lot you will expect it and it should be no biggy. Its made of high quality stainless steel. It will last for years to come and more. We like it. Just get it, it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: B Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a small grill
customer_reviews.text: I have a two burner grill so not much room. This basket fits well. It is sturdy and cooks food evenly and cleans up well. Naturally the stainless steel discolors from the heat but that's immaterial to me because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: CateBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Small Stain less steel Bastket
customer_reviews.text: It fits will in my grill, leaving space for other items. I grill vegetables with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sailer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, though I don't feel like the food get as good of a grill mark/flavor when placed in this basket. It's still a nice option to have if you forgot to soak skewers for bite sized pieces of food, or when its too hot to cook inside and you don't have a side burner on your grill to cook small items
customer_reviews.author: Quiet DissidenceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for veggies on the grill for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for veggies on the grill for my husband and me. Because it is so compact, we can grill the veggies and still have room on the grill for meat. Cleans up easily, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Discolored after one use
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but it gets discolored after one use. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bhat

customer_reviews.title: Great for veggies!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love to grill and no grill out is complete without some grilled vegetables. We have used this for potatoes, peppers, onions, etc...we love it. The only thing I would add, pay attention to the word "small" in the description. This basket is definitely for 2, don't buy this to grill vegetables for a whole family or a backyard party.
customer_reviews.author: w_johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size basket for cooking vegetable for two people. It holds 4 or so small red potatoes or 2+ chopped peppers. The basket dispenses heat evenly over the whole surface of the bottom. It doesn't take up too much space on the grill, I can put the basket and two steaks on a weber kettle grill and they fit well. The only drawback is that it a little tough to clean since the heat bakes on the oils/spices. A great choice for a veggie basket.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions! Not as big as you think
customer_reviews.text: So small! I bought this to cook asparagus on my smoker and it is so small you can’t even fit it in there!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Does more than vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I did shrimp in this the other night to that was awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles j Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill basket!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this thing about 3-4 times a week since I bought it! I threw out the directions before I found out if it was dishwasher safe or not, so I have been handwashing it which does take some time, but worth it! Grills vegetables perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Connor

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, very well made
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small grill, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: barbaram

customer_reviews.title: I eat more veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket. It is the perfect size for me, but as others suggest measure to be sure. I expected it to be larger, but turns out this is better on my grill anyway. With this basket I just cut up any veggies I have, toss them in olive oil, salt, pepper & they come out perfect. My only regret is how long I cut zucchinis long ways to go direct on the grill. It is so much easier to contain them this way so I do it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should. Does not clean up as new but it's an outside product and for a BBQ. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Clements

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for the grill
customer_reviews.text: His is great for grilling anything from fresh veggies to shrimp. It fits perfect in my Webber grill. Everyone should have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size basic for to toss some veggies on the grill with dinner.
customer_reviews.author: jiberjab

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's great and has no non stick surface which is wonderful! All stainless steel and for half the price lowe's charges !
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Must have for grilling
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this almost every day. It's a wonderful option to have for vegetables on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: time to grill!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put on the back of the grill and let the veggies cook. nice size for two people and the sides are high enough to pile in diced potatoes and onions, or big chunks of peppers. I have also done pineapple spears and pieces of apples. just a handy basket to have for any griller.
customer_reviews.author: Mike In San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, cleans up well
customer_reviews.text: It is small just as it says, but I bought it for my small Weber grill for when my wife and I are grilling for only ourselves. If we cook for more than 3 of us we break out the big Weber grill and the larger basket. We are happy with this item, it is serving the exact need that we intended for it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Harris

customer_reviews.title: Grilling for one or two?
customer_reviews.text: If you are, you will love this basket. It is small! I have small infrared grill. This basket fits easily on grill with meat for 2. When I first saw it I thought there was no way it would be big enough to be of value. It is great for chopped veggies. Glad I bought. But forget it if you grill large amounts of veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as described. Haven’t used yet, but seems heavy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: This basket is great for cooking vegetables on the grill
customer_reviews.text: This basket is great for cooking vegetables on the grill. Cleans easily, I ended up buying a larger one as well to cook for more than 2 people at once.
customer_reviews.author: Asterid

customer_reviews.title: This is great for vegetable for two on the grill
customer_reviews.text: This is great for vegetable for two on the grill. Also good size for peppers/onions for brats for 4-5 people. Love being able to throw in the dishwasher when done cooking. Will be getting the larger one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good for grilling veggies for 1-2 people.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this basket is quite small. However, if you have a small grill or you're not looking to make food for an entire family, it's a great product. We've been using ours several times a week for almost 2 months and it is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Grilled Veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on my grill. Perfect size for grilling vegetables for a family of 4. If you are grilling for a large party you might want to use a bigger version of this tray.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: great help
customer_reviews.text: I used to put veggies directly on the grate which made it difficult to cook them well and certain ones like asparagus always lost some through the grate. The basket is awesome, load up, place on grill an turn the veggies in the basket. Cooks better, no loss through the grate.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: good for more then vegies
customer_reviews.text: good for vegies on the grill it will twist a bit on hi heat then spring back but works fine. I have used for burgers that were on a wide spaced great on a camp grill and this thing rocks threw some salmon Berger's on it also I am looking for a larger one for camping
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: accidently bought this
customer_reviews.text: I guess I will pay for my mistakes, but this weber tray is heavy and sharp. has sharp steel integrated into the pattern on the basket itself just like the pic shows.
customer_reviews.author: Geode the rock kind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Woks great on the grill! Easy to clean, what more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Scott Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our small Grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small Grill! We love in an apartment where we can only have an electric Grill ( Char Broil electric Grill 5 stars by the way) anyway, I wanted something that would fit our smaller grill. This little vegetable basket is PERFECT for a smaller grill. It's just the two of us so it's all we need. If are you trying to entertain or have more than 2 people in your household this probably won't work for a larger group.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my new smaller two burner ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my new smaller two burner BBQ. I can still cook dinner for two and veggies at the same time with this smaller sized tray.
customer_reviews.author: gjam

customer_reviews.title: Great for in the bathroom too
customer_reviews.text: This basket is a lot better quality than I was expecting. Pleasantly surprised. I put it on my sink counter in my bathroom to hols face wash, Soap, Lotion and moisturizer. Just those little things that needed a "spot". I don't have to worry about it getting wet because of the quality. A definite good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good for BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Good as expected..I use this year around ! It shows use but totally usable.....Will last me for many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Its a little smaller than i thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a little smaller than i thought it would be, but the girlfriend likes it for veggies on the grill - win!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Surperior ro "coated" style baskets.
customer_reviews.text: Preheats quickly, easy to clean up, sturdily built.... I bought this as a replacement for a "coated" vegetable basket from a different manufacturer. It has held up very well for the past 5 or 6 uses. I'll update this review next season.
customer_reviews.author: j.m.

customer_reviews.title: We have a weber spirit 200 and this fits perfect on one side for our veggies (green beans are ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a weber spirit 200 and this fits perfect on one side for our veggies (green beans are fabulous in this on the grill) leaving plenty of room on the opposite side for meat.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of veggies to put on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl White

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Get 2. This is amazing. You will never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Americanwumn
